item.description:
Let's get ready for Halloween!

Come find that special pumpkin at Farmer Mo's pumpkin patch at Tougas Family Farm to carve a jack-o-lantern, or to decorate your front steps for fall.

This is planned for a weekend so that the daddies can come too. Bring your camera 'cause there's nothing cuter than a baby in the pumpkin patch! And it's a great family photo opportunity too--we can take turns snapping fun shots in the pumpkin field. (I even made a photo book last year called "Kendall's Day in the Pumpkin Patch.")

Enjoy a scenic wagon ride around the orchards and pumpkin patches or try some freshly baked pumpkin pie in the Farm Kitchen.

Wagon rides at the farm run weekends 10:15 AM - 5:00 PM.

Pumpkin prices are per pound and you weigh your "harvest" on your way out of the field.
Pumpkin Patch Prices: There is no admission fee to the pumpkin patch, but pumpkin purchases do not include wagon rides. Pumpkins are $0.59/lb.

Pumpkin Picking at Tougas Farm

This date is two weeks before Halloween so they should still have a good selection. (We went last year the weekend before Halloween and it was really "slim pickin's"...)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our pumpkins from last year.
item.name: Find your Halloween pumpkin!
